1.0.name: wordpress/redirector-mod
1.0.description:
With this Plugin you can redirect a page in your WordPress installation to any other URL, to a page in your WordPress installation or to the first child page.

This plugin is a fork of Redirector by Ralf Hortt. It has been updated for WP 3.0 and does not automatically insert 'http:' before any custom redirect thus enabling use of partial URIs and query string as your redirect rather than fully qualified URLs.
